title: The Art of Storytelling: Bottoms (2019)
summary: Hollywood has a long history of treating queer characters with very specific (and often limiting) storytelling rules. Bottoms deliberately throws those rules out the window, creating a version of queer representation that feels fresh, chaotic, and rebellious.

title: The Future of Adversarial Machine Learning
summary: I am writing about the potential of adversarial attacks and how they could benefit society
